title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 167.4 - Filing requirements for private bridge inventory data
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 167.4 - Filing requirements for private bridge inventory data

State Regulations
(a) Every county highway superintendent and
the City of New York shall file the private bridge inventory on or before

October 1, 1990 with the Department of Transportation regional director, within
whose region the private bridges are located. (b) Private bridge inventory
form. Private Bridge Inventory Form
(Complete separate form for each bridge)

Spans:_______________________________________________

Bridge:____ft. L. General Type of

Main Span:________
__________________________________________________________________________________

__________________________________________________________________________________
ADDRESS
SIGNATURE.. DATE....................................................................................................... Notes

167.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
